oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An advertisement of Nashville Union and American newspaper, published in the 1871 Nashville City Directory. The newspaper was established in 1853 through a merger of The Nashville Union (founded in 1835) and Nashville American (began publishing in 1848) newspapers. Publication of all newspapers was suspended during the Civil War, and it was 1865 before the Union and American resumed printing. Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Union and American (Nashville, Tenn.)
